channel.title: homekit on Matthew C Dev
channel.description: Recent content in homekit on Matthew C Dev

item.title: I Love Parsec + HomeKit
item.description: I have lots of laptops and one desktop. While jumping around the country, it’s annoying to have to setup a dev environment on every machine. There are solutions out there like docker, github codespaces, or renting a VM from one of the dozens of cloud providers. But I already have a great desktop with everything I want already setup. I work on tons of different projects (most don’t see enough work to warrant a writeup) and it’s annoying to have to provision the different environment.
